body_html:
Just one quick question. Arch Linux now packages the tensorflow library with the pkgconfig file.
However, they place the header file in

/usr/include/tensorflow/c_api.h

instead of

/usr/include/tensorflow/c/c_api.h

Is that a problem? which one should be the standard? Thanks in advance!
body_text:
Just one quick question. Arch Linux now packages the tensorflow library with the pkgconfig file.
However, they place the header file in
/usr/include/tensorflow/c_api.h

instead of
/usr/include/tensorflow/c/c_api.h

Is that a problem? which one should be the standard? Thanks in advance!
body:
Just one quick question. Arch Linux now packages the tensorflow library with the pkgconfig file.
However, they place the header file in 
```
/usr/include/tensorflow/c_api.h
```
instead of
```
/usr/include/tensorflow/c/c_api.h
```
Is that a problem? which one should be the standard? Thanks in advance!
